WorkItem.Description:
I am new to Rawr, and so may well be doing something stupid - but I watched the video and under "File" I selected "Load from Battle.net" - I changed the server to "EU", realm to "Shattered Halls" and one of my character names, and this is what I am getting:
 
The remote server returned an error: (503) Server Unavailable.
 
   at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)
 
You can also check the Troubleshooting Guide for more steps on getting Rawr to run smoothly. http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Troubleshooting
 
If you still have this problem after performing the suggested fix, please copy and paste this into a new ticket in the Issue Tracker. Thanks!

Comments.Message: It look like the server may be down/having problems.  For now either load your character from a local saved file, or input your items manually.
